about_the_game:
This music pack has 9 loopable tracks, totaling over 12 minutes of authentic 16-bit music perfect for your RPG. This bundle features a variety of ear catching songs to help kickstart your RPG Maker project!

Features:

* 9 royalty free songs
* ogg, m4a and wav formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents cannot be edited except fade in and fade out is ok, shortening songs is ok
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
